{{Refimprove|date=November 2014}} {{Politics of Burundi}} [[Burundi]]'s relations with its neighbours have often been affected by security concerns. Hundreds of thousands of Burundian [[refugee]]s have at various times crossed to neighboring [[Rwanda]], [[Tanzania]], and the [[Democratic Republic of the Congo]]. Hundreds of thousands of Burundians are in neighboring countries as a result of the ongoing civil war. Most of them, more than 340,000 since 1993, are in Tanzania. Some Burundian rebel groups have used neighboring countries as bases for insurgent activities. The 1993 embargo placed on Burundi by regional states hurt diplomatic relations with its neighbors; relations have improved since the 1999 suspension of these sanctions.
Burundi is a member of various international and regional organizations, including the [[United Nations]], the [[African Union]], the [[African Development Bank]] and the [[Francophonie]]. The Swedish [[Minister for Integration and Gender Equality]], [[Nyamko Sabuni]], was born in Burundi.
==Bilateral relations== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:100%; margin:auto;" |- ! style="width:15%;"| Country ! style="width:12%;"| Formal Relations Began !Notes |- valign="top" |{{flag|Andorra}}||<!--Date started-->30 May 2007|| Both countries established diplomatic relations on May 30, 2007<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.mae.ad/en/bilateral-and-consular-affairs/bilateral-affairs |title=Bilateral Affairs |publisher=Mae.ad |date= |accessdate=2018-12-30}}</ref>. |- valign="top" |{{flag|Argentina}}||<!--Date started-->||
Both countries established diplomatic relations on September 20, 1976<ref>{{cite web|url=http://tratados.mrecic.gov.ar/tratado_ficha.php?id=3939 |title=Biblioteca Digital de Tratados |publisher=Tratados.mrecic.gov.ar |date= |accessdate=2018-12-30}}</ref>. |- valign="top" |{{flag|Armenia}}||<!--Date started-->28 May 1992|| Both countries established diplomatic relations on 28 May 1992.
|- valign="top" |{{flag|Australia}}||<!--Date started-->|| [[Australia]] is represented in Burundi by its embassy in [[Nairobi]], [[Kenya]]<ref>[https://dfat.gov.au/about-us/our-locations/missions/Pages/our-embassies-and-consulates-overseas.aspx]</ref><ref>[https://www.mae.gov.bi/en/foreign-missions-in-burundi-with-residence-abroad/]</ref>.
|- valign="top" |{{flag|Belgium}}||<!--Date started-->||
* Belgium has an embassy in [[Bujumbura]].<ref>{{cite web|url=https://burundi.diplomatie.belgium.be/language_selection|title=La Belgique au Burundi - Taalkeuze - Choix de langue - Sprachauswahl - Language Choice|website=burundi.diplomatie.belgium.be|accessdate=30 December 2018}}</ref> * Burundi has an embassy in [[Brussels]].<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.ambaburundi.be/|title=Accueil|website=www.ambaburundi.be|accessdate=30 December 2018}}</ref>
|- valign="top" |{{flag|Canada}}||<!--Date started-->1969|| *Both countries established diplomatic relations in 1969<ref>[https://www.canadainternational.gc.ca/kenya/bilateral_relations_bilaterales/canada_burundi.aspx?lang=eng]</ref>. *Both countries are full members of the [[Organisation internationale de la Francophonie]].
|- valign="top" |{{flag|China}}||<!--Date started-->21 December, 1963||See [[Burundi–China relations]] Both countries established diplomatic relations many years back <ref>[https://www.fmprc.gov.cn/mfa_eng/wjb_663304/zzjg_663340/fzs_663828/gjlb_663832/2929_663864/]</ref>.
|- valign="top" |{{flag|Cyprus}}||<!--Date started-->||
*Burundi is represented in Cyprus by its embassy in [[Geneva]], Switzerland<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.mfa.gov.cy/mfa/mfa2016.nsf/All/AC68ABA3ADCF9AAFC225802900312095?OpenDocument|title=MINISTRY OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS - Foreign Diplomatic Missions in Cyprus – International Organizations|website=www.mfa.gov.cy|accessdate=30 December 2018}}</ref> and an honorary consulate in [[Nicosia]]<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.mfa.gov.cy/mfa/mfa2016.nsf/All/A7DD705E410C803AC22580290033AFE9?OpenDocument|title=MINISTRY OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS - Honorary Consular Officers in Cyprus|website=www.mfa.gov.cy|accessdate=30 December 2018}}</ref>. *Cyprus is represented in Burundi by its embassy in [[Doha]], Qatar<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.mfa.gov.cy/mfa/mfa2016.nsf/All/B8A15E011F4D30A3C2258029002F400A?OpenDocument|title=MINISTRY OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS - Cyprus Diplomatic Missions Abroad|website=www.mfa.gov.cy|accessdate=30 December 2018}}</ref> and an honorary consulate in Bujumbura<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.mfa.gov.cy/mfa/mfa2016.nsf/All/1B9DC2259708BEBEC225802900324A2F?OpenDocument|title=MINISTRY OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS - Honorary Consular Officers of the Republic of Cyprus|website=www.mfa.gov.cy|accessdate=30 December 2018}}</ref>. *Both countries are full members of the [[Organisation internationale de la Francophonie]]. |- valign="top" |{{flag|Georgia}}||<!--Date started-->21 March 1993||
Both countries established diplomatic relations on March 21, 1993<ref>{{cite web|url=http://mfa.gov.ge/MainNav/ForeignPolicy/BilateralRelations/%E1%83%91%E1%83%A3%E1%83%A0%E1%83%A3%E1%83%9C%E1%83%93%E1%83%98%E1%83%A1-%E1%83%A0%E1%83%94%E1%83%A1%E1%83%9E%E1%83%A3%E1%83%91%E1%83%9A%E1%83%98%E1%83%99%E1%83%90.aspx|title=საქართველოს საგარეო საქმეთა სამინისტრო - ბურუნდის რესპუბლიკა|website=mfa.gov.ge|accessdate=30 December 2018}}</ref>.
|- valign="top" |{{flag|India}}||<!--Date started-->|| *[[Burundi]] has an embassy in [[New Delhi]]<ref>[https://www.mae.gov.bi/en/burundi-embassies-abroad/]</ref>. *[[India]] is represented in Burundi by its embassy in [[Kampala]], [[Uganda]]<ref>[https://www.mae.gov.bi/en/foreign-missions-in-burundi-with-residence-abroad/]</ref>. *Both countries have a number of bilateral agreements<ref>[https://mea.gov.in/bilateral-documents.htm?dtl/20619/list+of+documents+signed+during+the+state+visit+of+president+of+burundi]</ref>.
|- valign="top" |{{flag|Israel}}||<!--Date started-->March 1995||
Both countries established diplomatic relations in March 1995<ref>{{cite web |url=http://mfa.gov.il/MFA/AboutTheMinistry/Pages/Israel-s%20Diplomatic%20Missions%20Abroad.aspx |title=Archived copy |accessdate=2016-04-25 |url-status=dead |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20160420071334/http://mfa.gov.il/MFA/AboutTheMinistry/Pages/Israel-s%20Diplomatic%20Missions%20Abroad.aspx |archivedate=2016-04-20 }}</ref>.
|- valign="top" |{{flag|Japan}}||<!--Date started-->1 July 1962|| Both countries established diplomatic relations on July 1, 1962<ref>[https://www.mofa.go.jp/region/africa/burundi/data.html]</ref>.
|- valign="top" |{{flag|Kenya}}||<!--Date started-->||See [[Kenya–Burundi relations]]
* Kenya has an embassy in Bujumbura.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.kenyaembassyburundi.com/|title=Home - Kenya Embassy|website=www.kenyaembassyburundi.com|accessdate=30 December 2018}}</ref> * Burundi has an embassy in [[Nairobi]]. |- valign="top" |{{flag|Latvia}}||<!--Date started-->24 May 1993||
Both countries established diplomatic relations on May 24, 1993<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.mfa.gov.lv/en/policy/establishment-and-renewal-of-diplomatic-relations|title=Establishment and renewal of diplomatic relations|first=Liene|last=Lobzova|website=www.mfa.gov.lv|accessdate=30 December 2018}}</ref>. |- valign="top" |{{flag|Lithuania}}||<!--Date started-->17 May 1993||
Both countries established diplomatic relations on May 17, 1993<ref>[https://urm.lt/default/en/list-of-countries-with-which-lithuania-has-established-diplomatic-relations]</ref>. |- valign="top" |{{flag|Mexico}}||<!--Date started-->28 July 1977||
* Burundi is accredited to Mexico from its embassy in Washington, D.C., United States.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.burundiembassydc-usa.org |title=Embassy of Burundi in the United States |publisher=Burundiembassydc-usa.org |date=2014-05-24 |accessdate=2018-12-30}}</ref> * Mexico is accredited to Burundi from its embassy in Nairobi, Kenya and maintains an honorary consulate Bujumbura.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://embamex.sre.gob.mx/kenia/|title=Versión en Español|website=embamex.sre.gob.mx|accessdate=30 December 2018}}</ref> |- valign="top" |{{flag|Montenegro}}||<!--Date started-->17 August 2012||
Both countries established diplomatic relations on August 17, 2012<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.mvp.gov.me/rubrike/bilateralni-odnosi/Tabela-priznanja-i-uspostavljanja-diplomatskih-odn|title=Tabela priznanja i uspostavljanja diplomatskih odnosa|website=www.mvp.gov.me|accessdate=30 December 2018}}</ref>.
|- valign="top" |{{flag|North Korea}}||<!--Date started-->12 March 1967<ref>{{cite book |last1=Wertz|first1=Daniel|last2=Oh|first2=JJ|last3=Kim|first3=Insung|date=August 2016|title=Issue Brief: DPRK Diplomatic Relations|publisher=The National Committee on North Korea|url=http://www.ncnk.org/resources/publications/NCNK_Issue_Brief_DPRK_Diplomatic_Relations.pdf|access-date=22 February 2019|url-status=live|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20161228074114/http://www.ncnk.org/resources/publications/NCNK_Issue_Brief_DPRK_Diplomatic_Relations.pdf|archive-date=28 December 2016|page=8}}</ref>||
See [[Burundi–North Korea relations]]
|- valign="top" |{{flag|Romania}}||<!--Date started-->8 August 1968||
Both countries established diplomatic relations on August 8, 1968<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.mae.ro/en/node/2187|title=Diplomatic Relations of Romania - Ministry of Foreign Affairs|website=www.mae.ro|accessdate=30 December 2018}}</ref>. |- valign="top" |{{flag|Rwanda}}||<!--Date started-->||
Burundi and Rwanda dispute sections of border on the [[Akanyaru River|Akanyaru]] and the [[Kagera River|Kagera]]/[[Nyabarongo River|Nyabarongo]] rivers, which have changed course since the 1960s, when the boundary was delimited; cross-border conflicts among [[Tutsi]], [[Hutu]], other ethnic groups, associated political rebels, armed gangs, and various government forces persist in the Great Lakes region. |- valign="top" |{{flag|Serbia}}||<!--Date started-->1962||
Both countries established diplomatic relations on 1962<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.mfa.gov.rs/en/foreign-policy/bilateral-issues/96-bilateral-issues/12793-burundi|title=Burundi|website=www.mfa.gov.rs|accessdate=30 December 2018}}</ref>.
|- valign="top" |{{flag|South Africa}}||<!--Date started-->23 June 1995|| *Both countries established diplomatic relations on June 23, 1995<ref>[http://www.dirco.gov.za/foreign/bilateral/burundi.html]</ref>. *Both countries are full members of the [[African Union]] and of the [[African Economic Community]].
|- valign="top" |{{flag|South Korea}}||<!--Date started-->3 October 1993||
Establishment of diplomatic Relations between South Korea and the Republic of Burundi was on 3 October 1993. In October 1985 [[Minister of Finance]] Pierre Ngerngi attended the Annual General Meeting of the [[IMF]] and the [[IBRD]] in [[Seoul]], Korea.<ref>{{Cite web |url=http://www.mofa.go.kr/ENG/countries/middleeast/countries/20070804/1_24488.jsp?menu=m_30_50 |title=Archived copy |access-date=2018-12-31 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150904015758/http://www.mofa.go.kr/ENG/countries/middleeast/countries/20070804/1_24488.jsp?menu=m_30_50 |archive-date=2015-09-04 |url-status=dead }}</ref> |- valign="top" |{{flag|Tanzania}}||<!--Date started-->||See [[Burundi–Tanzania relations]]
* Burundi has an embassy in [[Dar es Salaam]]. * Tanzania has an embassy in Bujumbura. |- valign="top" |{{flag|Turkey}}||<!--Date started-->||
*Burundi has an embassy in [[Ankara]]<ref name="mfa.gov.tr">{{cite web|url=http://www.mfa.gov.tr/relations-between-turkey-and-burundi.en.mfa|title=From Rep. of Turkey Ministry of Foreign Affairs|website=Republic of Turkey Ministry of Foreign Affairs|accessdate=30 December 2018}}</ref>. *Turkey is represented in Burundi by its embassy in [[Kampala]], Uganda.<ref name="mfa.gov.tr"/>. |- valign="top" |{{flag|United States}}||<!--Date started-->||See [[Burundi-United States relations]]
* Burundi has an embassy in [[Washington, D.C.]].<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.burundiembassydc-usa.org |title=Embassy of Burundi in Washington, DC (in English and French) |publisher=Burundiembassydc-usa.org |date=2014-05-24 |accessdate=2018-12-30}}</ref> * United States has an embassy in Bujumbura.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://burundi.usembassy.gov|title=Embassy of the United States in Bujumbura (in English and French)|accessdate=30 December 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20110724142851/http://burundi.usembassy.gov/|archive-date=2011-07-24|url-status=dead}}</ref>
|- valign="top" |{{flag|Vietnam}}||<!--Date started-->16 April 1975|| *Both countries established diplomatic relations on April 16, 1975<ref>[http://www.mofa.gov.vn/en/cn_vakv/]</ref>. *Both countries are full members of the [[Organisation internationale de la Francophonie]]. |}
